pages.text: $(li)The Mansion is a big structure where the civilization of Illagers conduct their experiments that can be found over the Overworld.$(br)$(li)There are multiple variants of this structure depending on the biome where they were built.

$(li)Here can be found $(l:patchouli:illagers/vindicator)Vindicators$(/l), $(l:patchouli:illagers/pillager)Pillagers$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:illagers/evoker)Evokers$(/l), who will not be happy about your visit.
